import cart from 'assets/images/3D_cart.png' import round_cart from 'assets/images/round_cart.png' import 'assets/styles/cart.scss' import { useAtomValue } from 'jotai' import { Cart } from 'store/atoms' const CartComponent = () => { const cart = JSON.parse(useAtomValue(Cart)) const toggleCaddie = () => { document.getElementsByClassName('caddie')[0].classList.toggle('closed-caddie') } return ( <>
) } export default CartComponent
